channel.title: Ichi Ramen?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Ichi Ramen?"

item.title: Re: Ichi Ramen?
item.content:encoded:
From my understanding RARE means that you can get it only by doing global missions.

Ichi ramen works like WhiteEye jutsu but till day roll.

From top of Missions menu:

A mission with (rare) beside means that you can only get it by running General Missions.

item.title: Ichi Ramen?
item.content:encoded: Does it increase the chance of getting rare allies/items like the effects of Epic Dog Urination, or does it increase the chances of finding the missions labeled as 'rare', such as the Billy level 3, Heck Butterfly, etc.?
